resources.string:
If you are having trouble reciving Cadpage alerts on a Samsung device, see http://www.cadpage.org/faq/cadpage-2-0
 Updated 03/16/2019
 
 v2.1.2-4
 Location Fixes:
 Marion County, IN
 Northampton County, PA
 Kanawha County, WV
 
 General Fixes:
 Fixed problem preventing new Cadpage users from registering with direct paging vendors
 
 v2.1.2-3
 Backed out targeting latest version of Android (again)
 
 Location Fixes:
 Macon County, NC
 Adams County, OH
 Marion County, OR
 
 v2.1.2-2
 Updated to use latest suport libraries and target latest version of Android.
 
 v2.1.2-1
 Location Fixes:
 Washtenaw County, MI
 Madison County, MO
 Cattaraugus County, NY
 Onslow County, NC
 Crawford County, PA
 Franklin County, TN
 
 v2.1.1-3
 New Locations:
 Harrison County, IN
 
 Location Fixes:
 South Lake Tahoe, CA
 Boone County, IN
 Talbot County, MD
 Ontario County, NY
 Muskingum County, OH
 Josephine County, OR
 
 General Fixes:
 Users dependent on Cadpage text message processing were being allowed to disable it.
